p: Proteins associated with carbohydrate metabolism (3-bisphosphoglycerate-independent and dependent phosphoglycerate mutases, GpmA; glucose-6-phosphate isomerase, Pgi; phosphoglucosamine mutase, Pgm; pyruvate kinase, Pyk; and formate acetyltransferase, PflB) showed the highest relative abundance in L. monocytogenes Scott A cells treated with ethanol plus carvacrol (35 mg/L) and/or thyme EO (100 mg/L). With a few exceptions, carbohydrate metabolism proteins were underexpressed in cells treated with ethanol plus (E)-2-hexenal compared to ethanol alone.
